title: New Ranked
body: Playing "fill" is like playing "sup" every single game.

replies.body:
Playing anything that COULD get you Support probably will get you Support.

Simply because a new overlay is added to our champselect it doesn't magically remove the problems existing since LoL's first season -> very few people are interested in playing Support compared to going Top, Mid, ADC or even Jungle.

Going Mid/ADC, Top/ADC or Top/Mid you enjoy the usual 5~20 minute queuetimes, anything that could get you Support will usually put you as such with less than 5 seconds in queue. LoLs Matchmakingsystem must be quite desperate.
